techmeme.title: Memo: an arbitrator awards full severance package to an ex-Twitter employee, who was laid off when Elon Musk took over, first such resolution of 2K+ complaints (Bloomberg)
Q&A with Vinod Khosla on investing in AI and OpenAI, AI risks, the impact of AI in the labor market, regulation, dominance within the global AI race, and more (Astha Rajvanshi/TIME)
A teardown of Huawei's popular Qingyun L540 laptop, which relies on some foreign tech, reveals the challenges ahead for China's tech self-sufficiency efforts (Ryan McMorrow/Financial Times)
Celestia Foundation, which is behind the Celestia modular blockchain network, raised a $100M round led by Bain Capital Crypto, taking its total raised to $155M (Daniel Kuhn/The Block)
Revolut is spinning out its €8.5B wealth management offering into a standalone app and plans to launch it in European Economic Area countries by the end of 2024 (Emily Nicolle/Bloomberg)
